                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              3. delStu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              4. editStu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          21
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              5. quit
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            `)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          24
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          25
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func selectEvent(){
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          26
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            smr := newStuMr(100)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          27
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            for {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          28
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              // lopp show menu
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          29
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              showMenu()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          30
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          31
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              // input user choice
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              var choice int
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fmt.Print("input your choice:")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          34
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fmt.Scan(&choice)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          35
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fmt.Printf("your choice is:%v\n", choice)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          36
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          37
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              switch choice{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          38
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              case 1:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          39
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                smr.showStu()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          40
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              case 2:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          41
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                smr.addStu()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          42
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              case 3:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          43
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                smr.delStu()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          44
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              case 4:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          45
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                smr.editStu()
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          46
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              case 5:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          47
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                fmt.Println("bye~")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                os.Exit(1)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          49
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              default:
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                fmt.Println("your choice is wrong, pls input age...")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          51
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          52
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          53
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          xxxxxxxxxx
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          102
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          1
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // stuMgr.go
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          2
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          package main
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          3
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          4
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          import (
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          5
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            "fmt"
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          6
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          )
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          7
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          8
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // student struct
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          9
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          type student struct{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          10
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            name  string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          11
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            age   int
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          12
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          13
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          14
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func newStudent(name string, age int) student{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          15
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            return student{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          16
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              name: name,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          17
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               age: age,
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          18
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          19
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          20
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          21
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func (s *student) alterStu(newName string, newAge int) {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          22
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            s.name = newName
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          23
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            s.age  = newAge
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          24
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          25
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          26
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // studentManager struct
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          27
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          type stuMr struct{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          28
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            studentData map[int]student
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          29
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          30
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          31
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func newStuMr(stuSize int) stuMr{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          32
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            return stuMr{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          33
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              studentData: make(map[int]student, stuSize),
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          34
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          35
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          36
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          37
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func (s *stuMr) showStu() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          38
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            if len(s.studentData) == 0 {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          39
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fmt.Println("student data is empty, pls add first!!!")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          40
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              return
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          41
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          42
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fmt.Println("Id\tname\tage")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          43
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            for k,v := range s.studentData{
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          44
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                              fmt.Printf("%v\t%v\t%v\n",k, v.name, v.age)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          45
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          46
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          }
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          47
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          48
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          // define globle virable
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          49
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          50
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          var (
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          51
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            id, age   int
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          52
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            name    string
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          53
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          )
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          54
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          

                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          55
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          func (s *stuMr) addStu() {
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          56
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fmt.Print("pls input name:")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          57
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fmt.Scan(&name)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          58
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          59
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fmt.Print("pls input age:")
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          60
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            fmt.Scan(&age)
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          61
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          62
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            id++
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                          63
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                            s.studentData[id] = newStudent(name, age)
